title: Uyire Un Uyirena Lyrics Zero Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Uyire Un Uyirena Song Lyrics With English Meaning
Singer:Anirudh
Lyrics: Kabilan
Music: Nivas K Prasanna
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Uyire
un uyirena
naan iruppen.

anbae

inimel
un  idhazhinil
naan sirippaen.

idhamaai
un idhayathil
kaaththiruppen

kanave

kanavaai
un vizhigalil
kaaththiruppen

dhinamae

mazhayaai
en manadhinil
nee vilundhaai.

vilundhaal
oru vidhaiyena
naan ezhundhaen.

Uyire
un uyirena
naan iruppen.

anbae

inimel
un  idhazhinil
naan sirippaen.

viralukkum
idhalukkum
pirandhidum isaiyena
iruvarum iruppom
idamporul marappom

unakena enakena
mudhal edhu
mudivedhu
edhuvarai iruppom
adhuvarai pirappom

yaar nee
yaar naan
vaa nee
nee naan

ulagin kadhavai
thaazh thirappom
uyire
mazhalai mozhiyaai
magizhindhiruppom.

Uyire
un uyirena
naan iruppen.

anbae

kaaththiruppen

nee vilundhaai.

vilundhaal
oru vidhaiyena
naan ezhundhaen.		 English Meaning
I tried my best :)
My soul
I will be
your life.

dear

henceforth
I will smile
with your lips.

pleasantly,
I will wait
in your heart.

my dream

Like a dream,
I will wait
in your eyes.

everday,

you fell
like a rain
in my heart.

if you fall,
I will raise
like a seed

My soul
I will be
your life.

dear

henceforth,
I will smile
with your lips.

like a music
created between
fingers and lips,
we will be like that
and forgot the time.

for you and me
where is the beginning?
where is the end?
how long we can live?
we’ll be together till that time.

who’re you?
who I am?
come to me
you and I are same.

let’s open the door
of this world.
my soul
let's be happy
like a child

I will be
your life.

henceforth

with your lips.

pleasantly,

in your heart.

in your eyes.
